Lyric:
[00:07.719]I had a way then losing it all on my own
[00:15.109]I had a heart then but the queen has been overthrown
[00:23.499]And I'm not sleeping now, the dark is too hard to beat
[00:32.290]And I'm not keeping now, the strength I need to push me
[00:39.990]You show the lights that stop me turn to stone
[00:43.819]You shine it when I'm alone
[00:47.239]And so I tell myself that I'll be strong
[00:51.819]And dreaming when they're gone
[00:56.400]'Cause they're calling, calling, calling me home
[01:00.490]Calling, calling, calling home
[01:03.990]You show the lights that stop me turn to stone
[01:07.769]You shine it when I'm alone
[01:10.919]Home

[01:47.729]You shine it when I'm alone
